data.title: Gazprom
data.meta_description: Gazprom - today’s top stories. Gazprom - today's latest on this topic. TASS – Russia’s leading public news agency.
data.text:
Gas supply by Gazprom for Europe through Ukraine totals 39.3 mcm via Sudzha

Gas supply by Gazprom for Europe through Ukraine totals 39.6 mcm via Sudzha

Gazprom supplies 38.5 mln cubic meters of gas to Europe via Ukraine

Gazprom Neft posts almost 8% rise in 1H net profit under IFRS

Gas supply by Gazprom for Europe through Ukraine totals 42.4 mcm via Sudzha

Russian oil industry will be independent of foreign equipment by 2027 — Gazprom Neft CEO

Gazprom Neft increases share of hard-to-recover reserves in production to 65% — CEO

Gas supply by Gazprom for Europe through Ukraine totals 42.05 mcm via Sudzha

Gazprom delivering 42.4 mln cubic meters of gas to Europe through Ukraine via Sudzha

Gazprom Neft to pay out record 2023 dividends of 102.43 rubles per share

Gazprom’s new project from early 2024 will connect Russia’s west and east gas systems

Gazprom not to pay dividends for 2023
